channel.title: Issues with crowns ;3 +repp [pi]
channel.description:
trying to add a super donor crown ;3 i have edited what used to be the server sponsor in yell but cannot find where i would add the crown infront of the persons name XD.
anyone help plawks? will rep even though its simple as shit.
btw im talking about when they talk but not when they yell i have allready done that ;3
basically i want to edit the player rights needed for this crown any idea?
